Description: taxonomic classification of high-throughput sequencing reads
bio.tool_description: Program for the taxonomic assignment of high-throughput sequencing reads, e.g., Illumina or Roche/454, from whole-genome sequencing of metagenomic DNA. Reads are directly assigned to taxa using the NCBI taxonomy and a reference database of protein sequences from Bacteria, Archaea, Fungi, microbial eukaryotes and viruses.
